channel.title: Teletome

item.title: Teletome
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

OK, when it does that it means:

  1. The name is too short, say less than 3 or 4 letters.

  2. There character file can’t be found using the command, which basically means they need to have signed i and out 1 to 2 + times so there character file exists for the command to work. I multiple logged in using 2 dif clients to my server, and with my owner account and a new account, and teletome, and also teleto didnt work. i logged the account out and in once and they both worked ( the new account is the one i logged out and in).

So, hope i helped…

[center]~ Sinior Jube Head[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Teletome
item.dc:creator: @ChrisDaden ChrisDaden
item.description:
@ChrisDaden wrote:

It looks fine… I may be missing something, but I seemed to notice that in my server, it doesn’t always tele them to you. A way you can test this is get on an account with no space, and try and use the teletome command with no space. (Checks to see if its valid.)

Read full topic

item.title: Teletome
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

lets say if i try typeing in ::xteletome 123_abc and username = 123 abc
i try with and without underscore but it still dont work, is anything wrong in my code that i havent found?

 if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights == 2)) {
        try {
            String otherPName = command.substring(10);
            int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                p.teleportToX = absX;
                p.teleportToY = absY;
                p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                p.updateRequired = true;
                // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them";
                p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + playerName);
            } else {
                sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
        }

Read full topic
